body: Used most often by gnome sheriffs and rangers, a sheriff's whistle gives off a piercing shriek that can easily be heard up to 1,000 feet away under ordinary circumstances. However, the frequency of the shriek is such that it can only be heard by badgers, dogs, and gnomes.
name: Sheriff's Whistle
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Equipment/Sheriffs Whistle
